resources.string: Shiver me timbers! Yer phone\'s booty be hornswaggled, matey! Heave ho t\' peer into the depths
Ye be on the way to Davy Jones\' Locker, me hearties
Yer device is a landlubber - it aint\'t got its sea legs.\nShe\'ll be weighing anchor and mining LOSCoins t\' protect yer from th\' scallywags!
Sink me! 0x00D6A%1$d ho! (Arr, she\'ll be walkin\' the plank smartly)
Ye can find the booty ye be after by walking the plank with Br0Zip PRO. Ye can crimp that from LOSCoin store
